SEARCH
Package edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.entity

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
edu.ntu.ccds.sc2002.entity.Internship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Internship extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an internship opportunity in the system. Implements Serializable for data persistence.
